tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor has a great understanding of the problem of the patients. Since he has the entire setup at his location, he gives best Turn Around Time (TAT) for the patients. He feels the intensity of the problem and responds appropriately. He gives best value-for-money preposition for the treatment. ** ** **** ********* well learned and is a reverred name globally in Dental healthcare circles. He charges reasonably and may not cheat the patients depending on their urgency. He has a battery of dentists who are well experienced and well qualified. I strongly recommend Dr Sagar for any of the dental treatments.

The team is just fantastic - had a great smile makeover and II loving my pearly whites . On all my appointments ,  I had seen atleast 2 -3 foreigners sitting for dental work - that itself is a testimony of the quality work they provine for which international people come and visit. Highly recommended.

1. Dr. Abichandani is impressive for first-timers like me. His setup Doesn't feel like a clinic at all. Feels like you're entering an IT company.
2. Maybe one of the few doctors who gives equal importance to educating the patients first and then putting efforts for consultation.
3. Experienced hands I must say!

Very Friendly person *** **** * ******* ********* ******* He would insist you to go for the solution with highest charges 2-3 lakhs. Not recommended for common people with limited budget and small issues.

I had excruciating pain in two of my molars and I visited Dr. Abhichandani who concluded that both had to be removed. Since I'm scared out of my wits of needles in my mouth I was obviously depressed about the surgery. However, the doctor was so gentle and careful with the entire procedure, I never felt a thing! With his aftercare tips, it didn't take more than a week for my mouth to heal. I would recommend this amazing dentist to any person any time!

One of the finest clinic visited ever.the ambience, clinic chair, x ray are world class. The doctors are very cordial, help. You feel at home n treatment was painless. God bless the team of dental hub.
